pageProduct.name: White Glo Charcoal Deep Stain Remover Mouthwash 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

White Glo Charcoal Deep Stain Remover Mouthwash is an activated charcoal whitening mouthwash that reduces stains, plaque and germs.

White Glo Deep Stain Remover mouthwash with activated charcoal helps whiten teeth and instantly freshens breath.

Activated charcoal is highly absorbent which can help remove bacteria, plaque and germs.

- Helps remove stains and whitens teeth.

- Kills germs that cause bad breath.

- Instant dentist clean feeling.

- Strengthens teeth enamel.

- Enriched fluoride for healthy teeth.

Directions

Rinse the mouth 1 or 2 times daily with 20ml mouthwash for approximately 30 seconds. Use undiluted. Do not swallow and do not rinse after use.
